name: Stem Cell and Tissue Enguneering Research P Reviews

review.title: “Stem cell research internship”
review.pros: Pros – it was a exciting learning experience to work in a stem cell research. The aim of the research was to cure neuro-degenerative diseases such as Alzhimer and Parkinson's disease by differentiating the stem cells into dopamine or oligodendrocyte precurssors
review.cons: Cons – Because it was a learning internship program there was no salary

review.title: “Great Atmosphere to work”
review.pros: Pros – Working with most happening health care sector in bringing newer solutions for unanswered chronic health problems., also working with health care and research professionals.
review.cons: Cons – may be in a sector where i am results are not that fast in putting them in to practice.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Go with people whom you trust n believe in their ability
